titleStmt.title: A sermon preached upon the XXXth of January S.V. 1684/5, at Paris in the chappel of the Right Honourable the Lord Vicount Preston, His Majestie's envoy extraordinary in the court of France
titleStmt.author: Wake, William, 1657-1737.

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon upon the thirtieth of January, 1684/5.
Attributed to William Wake. cf. BM.
This work appears as Wing W262 at reel 881:15 and as Wing W151 (number cancelled) at reel 1134:9.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
